name: Tom Zanetti
description: '''Thomas Byron Courtney''' (born 2 July 1989), known professionally as '''Tom Zanetti''', is a British DJ, music producer, rapper, singer and boxer. He is best known for his songs "Darlinâ€™" (2015) and "[[You Want Me]]" (2016), both of which received silver and platinum [[British Phonographic Industry|BPI]] certifications respectively. The latter of the two charted in the United Kingdom, Belgium and Republic of Ireland.
